sent.orig: We add the suffix "ly" to make the adjective "quick" into the adverb " quickly".
sent.trans: 我们在形容词“quick”后加“ly”构成副词“quickly”。

sent.orig: Bill runs quickly, Jack runs more quickly than Bill, and Bob runs most quickly of all.
sent.trans: 比尔跑得快，杰克跑得比比尔快，鲍伯在三者中跑得最快。

sent.orig: When you grow quickly, but not too quickly you have a chance grow, modify, and adapt.
sent.trans: 处于快速增长而又不是太快的时候，你还有机会来调整、适应、成长。

sent.orig: The fad starts by being quickly accepted and then quickly imitated by others.
sent.trans: 这种狂热很快蔓延起来，被人们模仿。

sent.orig: Wang not attend to other, quickly stepped forward to quickly grasp one of the men.
sent.trans: 王冬顾不上别的，快步上前，迅速扭住其中一名男子。
